name: Welcome to the Stream
description:
~Submission for the January Moonjam 2022~

Overview:

In welcome to the stream you play as a streamer on a quest to farm subscribers. You have to GAME to the best to your abilities to keep them satisfied. 

While you get more subscribers by the day, there might be those that don't support you as much waiting for their moment to strike...

Hmmm, is that pizza I smell?

Gameplay:

- Play videogames to gain subscribers

- Earn the adoration of your wife.

- Avoid angry fans that hunt you down when you're vulnerable.

- Eat food to not die, don't worry, it's delicious.
